channel.title: CNT on Khayrul Islam
channel.description: Recent content in CNT on Khayrul Islam

item.title: Tailoring polyamide nanocomposites: The synergistic effects of SWCNT chirality and maleic anhydride grafting
item.description: This paper investigates the synergistic effects of SWCNT chirality and maleic anhydride grafting using molecular dynamics simulations to improve the mechanical properties of polyamide nanocomposites.

item.title: Molecular dynamics simulation of the mechanical properties of CNT-polyoxymethylene composite with a reactive forcefield
item.description: This paper applies reactive force field molecular dynamics simulations to study the effect of SWCNTs on the mechanical properties of polyoxymethylene (POM) composites.
